metadata.title: CVE-2024-39573 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Potential SSRF in mod_rewrite in Apache HTTP Server 2.4.59 and earlierallows an attacker to cause unsafe RewriteRules to unexpectedly setup URL'sto be handled by mod_proxy.Users are recommended to upgrade to version 2.4.60, which fixes this issue.

criterions.comment: apache2 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
